title: Unable to connect to server problem
body: Hey guys i have this problem that after champion select the screen turns black and after 20 seconds a message pops up that says: unable to connect to the server.please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.My intertet is stable and it doesnt appear to have any problems in the lol client or browsing the net.Any tips on how  to solve this problem?

replies.body: Also having the same problem, tried everything on the connection guide still doing it, currently lost 6 games due to remakes in the past week, that's a lot of lp. Fix this please, also does riot remove leaverbuster penalties for they're new clients bugs? Don't really want to wait 30 minutes before every game because of a multi billion dollar company's bug. Litteraly at 20 minute wait timer now, fix this please or u will loose a customer.
I also have this problem, i've tried everything, but nothing works. Did i really become plat iv for no reason?.. i just want to play again..

Did thedarkfright solve this?

 I'm having the same issue and tried everything in the connection guide. I reinstalled twice, and once with clean uninstall. Also tried on my brothers computer without issues. Can anyone help?

Sincerely
Sp4zies Father

You likely have local network settings that conflict with the client's ability to connect. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to check on this.

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.
